system.availability: Devices capable of partially disrupting psychic energy, can take the form of a Protective Amulet or an Implant. The Protective Amulet can be physically removed, but the implant can have long-term side effects to a user. Both provide +20 to any test ro resist the effects of a Psychic Power and +10 to tests to resist possession. Has no effect on powers that inflict direct physical damage.
system.cost:
Psykers cannot use this item, as they will overload it.
Amulet:  0.5kg, 7000 Thrones, Implant: 12000 Thrones. Both Very Rare.
